recipe.title: Dean & Deluca's Tuna Sandwich with Carrots, Red Onion, and Parsley
ingredients: 4 six-ounce cans drained chunk white tuna in water
Half cut plus 1 tablespoon finely chopped red onion
One and a half cups of your favorite mayonnaise
1 small garlic clove, peeled and crushed
instructions: 1. Put the tuna in a large bowl. Mash. Add the carrots, onion, parsley, celery, and scallions. 2. Place the mayonnaise in a small bowl. Add the crushed garlic clove and the lemon juice. Add the mayonnaise mixture to the tuna. Mix together. Add salt and pepper to taste. Serve on rolls with lettuce and tomato.
